summary: Silver Bulletin approve column estimated at 40.9-41.3% as of Feb 1, with net -14.3. Declining trend decelerating.
content:
Key data points:
- Dec 15, 2025: approve 42.8%, disapprove 54.0%, net -11.2
- Jan 2, 2026: approve ~42%, disapprove ~54%, net ~-12
- Jan 21: net -12.9
- Jan 26: net -14.1
- Feb 1: net -14.3 (second term low was -15.0 on Nov 23)
- RCP Jan 29: approve 42.6%, disapprove 55.0% (net -12.4)

Trend: Decline accelerated Jan 21-26 (Pretti killing Jan 24), then decelerated Jan 26-Feb 1.
Silver Bulletin editor notes Pretti impact not fully baked in yet.
Strong disapproval at second-term high 45.7%.

Estimating approve from net: with total â‰ˆ96-97%, current approve is ~40.9-41.3%.
At second-term low (net -15.0), approve was ~40.5-40.75%.
